name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: So sad to hear about #JacquesChirac . For those who have worked closely with him, he will never die ! Because we can remember his views on all topics of today and on all types of human behavior ... But he was like a father for so many that we only can cry.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: I am pleased to read about the launch of anti-Google procedures in 50 states. This is impressive and powerful. Break monopolists in such a vital field is a nobrainer. In spite of Trump's awkward initiatives on many fronts, the US can still inspire the world !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Happy that @sylviegoulard is proposed as French EU Commissioner. Real expert of European matters, she has always promoted an ambitious vision of a more integrated Europe. I share her views and hope that Ursula von der Layen will be give her a key position in the new Commission !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Proud that Ursula @vonderleyen becomes President of the European Commission. As a German, as an experienced minister in various fields, as a politician both Democrat and Christian, as a medical doctor and an economist, as a woman and a mother of 7, she remarkably embodies Europe.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Great global meeting of the Trilateral Commission in Paris the two last days ! The first in Paris since 1989... Christine @Lagarde Wolfgang Schable, @EPhilippePM and many others made it very thoughtful. Like @FilippoGrandi (below), the UN commissioner for refugees.//t.co/LywsCYDse9

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Allegro Cantabile, my investment company, is glad to announce its support to Future Positive Capital and its Partners @sofiahmich, @aterrien & Michael Rosen. Long life and full success to their fund which I will help as Senior Advisor ! I am thrilled by their investment approach.//t.co/U3U1zSph4H

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Euthanasia of 100% passive patients without hope of recovery can't be a no brainer. The situation of #VincentLambert is a live drama. Sunday he cried when he understood he would be killed. Today judges imposed to his doctors to continue to feed him. A victory for human rights !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Happy that Rennes, Brittany's main town, won yesterday night the Soccer French Cup against Paris. Is it always a pleasure when David beats Goliath again !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Paris has just lost its heart. This is a terrible symbol in these times of doubts, social unrest, crisis of the Catholic Church and on the first day of the Holy Week. We are all crying.//t.co/JLu2EmMvUn

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: The British people lives an institutional nightmare! They should be reassured that Europeans are their allies, not their enemies. I am impressed by Saturday demonstration in London and by 5 million people signing to remain in the EU since last Wednesday. Put it to the people!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Congratulations to @GavinNewsom , Governor of California, for his historical decision to ban death penalty. The intentional killing of another person is wrong. And as governor, I will not oversee the execution of any individual.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Very proud for #Dinard because our city will host in April the G7 of Ministers for Foreign Affairs. May the beautiful landscapes of the Emerald coast and the influence of the sea open eyes & ears so that progress can be made towards peace and against terrorism & global risks!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Now that we know more what Carlos Ghosn is reproached with, I must say the so unusual magnitude of Japan's reaction is more understandable. But what about internal control systems at Nissan, unable to detect the crazy expenses apparently paid by Nissan for Ghosn and his family?

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: @LaBourseEtLaVie L'Etat actionnaire n'est certainement pas le meilleur actionnaire. Mais je ne parle pas des mrites et carences de Carlos Ghosn. Je dis qu'en l'occurrence c'est l'Etat rgalien qui devrait protester plus fort contre l'attitude agressive du Japon.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: @LaBourseEtLaVie Again, je ne justifie en rien ce que Ghosn aurait fait. Mais la procdure franaise encadre bien plus strictement la garde vue, pour tous les citoyens. Et je souligne le caractre emblmatique du PDG de Renault (e.g. Georges Besse) qui en fait en France un sujet diplomatique

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Whatever Carlos Ghosn did, I have no clue, I find it unacceptable from Japan to keep in jail with no judgement/explanation the CEO of THE iconic French company since WW2 with French state at 15%.This should be seen as a diplomatic aggression like China did with Huawei & Canada.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Ashamed of France's representation at #COP24Katowice : PM Philippe cancelled his participation because of unrest due to increase of taxes on diesel ! And even the junior minister for Environment Poirson left last Tuesday. It was about Paris agreement implementation though!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: @LesAmisdEttyH @Orasafenetre Le risque vident mais trs rel tant de devenir centr(e) sur soi-mme

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Many stores, schools, theaters, public buildings closed in #Paris tomorrow. France has not been terrorized by Bataclan shooting in 2015 but public authorities now spread fear because of a few thousands excited political activists vaguely calling for Macron to resign. Appalling!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: European session of Trilateral Commission is opening up in Ljubljana with Jean-Claude Trichet's introduction and the European hymn !//t.co/dMWWeUxu5w

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: In Saint-Malo bay, a French armada ready to start for the #RouteduRhum2018 . 123 boats heading to Guadeloupe for the 40th anniversary of this race. Courage, hi-tech and intimacy with nature explain the tremendous popular success.//t.co/gTL8W0ZxBD

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Why @AlimaOng is so efficient ? Because it partners with local NGOs and public authorities. ALIMA means Alliance for International Medical Action and makes sure to have strong relays on the ground. I am proud to be part of this alliance for life and health !//t.co/pKjuukJF5A

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: One week in Africa with @AlimaOng, this great international NGO providing medical aid in crisis situations. From Bamako, I can realize what it is to help saving lives in countries with growing terrorism and insecurity//t.co/XPZ5NoBVHr

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Le matre d'une gnration entire nous a quitts.#PhilippeLaduguie n'est plus et ses anciens lves d'histoire-gographie pleurent ce professeur qui incarnait lui seul le meilleur de l'enseignement public : plus de 40 prix au concours gnral @LLG75005 @_FLemoine_

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Who could be more synthetic than @Yuvalharari ? In 1938, humans were offered three global stories to choose from, in 1968 just two, in 1998 a single story seemed to prevail ; in 2018 we are down to zero. Fascism, communism and liberalism have vanished one after the other !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: - #Dinard's summer is not over. The British Film Festival presents 24 interesting movies. The jury chaired by @monicabelluci will have to decide tonight on the best one ! Harry Potter is well represented in the jury with Rupert Grint (Ron) and Ian Hart (Pr Quirell)//t.co/HCJaAKqTb8

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Against #Ebola in #DRC, there are new efficient techniques. Alliance for International Medical Action @AlimaOng deployed in Congo Biosecure Emergency Care Units, which it call cubes. 10x quicker, 5x cheaper. To know more about it//t.co/sSqXUyfq5A . Please help ALIMA !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Against #Ebola in #DRC, there are new efficient techniques. Alliance for International Medical Action @AlimaOng deployed in Congo Biosecure Emergency Care Units, which it call cubes. 10x quicker, 5x cheaper. To know more about it//t.co/sSqXUyfq5A . Please help ALIMA !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Very sad to see #Brazil lose its national treasures in flames ! For a new country, history is as much important as for Italy or Greece. Without their history, peoples can lose their soul and fall under any despotism. The extreme-right candidate is ahead of polls in Brazil...

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Excess in French politics : Parliament postponed changes in Constitution because they want to investigate #BENALLA s case. It was right to ask @EmmanuelMacron to get rid of his guilty aid. It is wrong to hijack French reforms agenda for such politician purpose.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Just amazing ! Invest in Africa...for you and for the Africans !//t.co/lF9bNGNJM9

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Amazing to see French Parliament opposition fight against the reduction by 30% of the Parliament members. They are close to 1,000 today ! @EmmanuelMacron and @EPhilippePM should stick to their promise. It is a question of efficiency, of cost savings and above all of exemplarity !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Congratulations to the French soccer team and...to Croatia ! @equipedefrance//t.co/yQfHtYnrQZ

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Congratulations to @EmmanuelMacron for his remarkable visit to Nigeria. As an active investor in Nigeria, discouraged in 2012 to invest by our local embassy, I feel better to see our President, fully aware of 192 m energetic people, relaunch our bilateral relations on all fronts.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Hey Mr President, it's a pity every student in Santa Fe did not have a gun : no doubt this would have made this horrible tragedy impossible !! #bataclan @realDonaldTrump All my thoughts and prayers to the victims and their families. Please change the law NOW. #MarchForOurLives

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Hey Mr President, it's a pity every student in Santa Fe did not have a gun : no doubt this would have made this horrible tragedy impossible !! #bataclan @realDonaldTrump All my thoughts and prayers to the victims and their families. Please change the law NOW. #MarchForOurLives

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: It is a shame to see some French students on strike and blocking access to exam centers. They just mimic 1968 and the conservative forces like unions in rail or airlines. @EmmanuelMacron said in Aachen that France has changed. On its way...but not really yet ! #letstudentswork

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Currently in #Peru, I am amazed by their vitality. Strong growth is back, led by commodities, fishing and tourism. Former corrupted president had to resign. Education & infrastructure made real progress. French companies should invest more in this 30 million people country !//t.co/SossXCOq1W

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Whatever the necessary calculations from both sides, what happened in #Korea is great ! Another evidence that dialogue, strong international consensus and political will can turn a catastrophic situation into a real hope, still to materialize after this #koreansummit !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Whatever the necessary calculations from both sides, what happened in #Korea is great ! Another evidence that dialogue, strong international consensus and political will can turn a catastrophic situation into a real hope, still to materialize after this #koreansummit !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: We need gifted children who will become gifted adults and make France successful over the long run. We need an educational system better adapted to the best pupils and students.//t.co/g7QkqK7XJv

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: With Trump, separation of powers needs to be organized to contain his interventions at federal level and prevent him from giving pardons for state crimes. The presidential power of giving individual pardons in the US or France is an awkward limitation of power for the judiciary.//t.co/xp5j0pVuvm

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Use of chemical weapons is a clear red line. And you can never leave red lines be crossed without strong reaction. @EmmanuelMacron was right to attack Syria's chemical facilities.//t.co/xoo7GVaHAa

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: So many pan European initiatives for young students. Marketing builds on this trend : a real single market exists. The (French) Dreamers even started from Manchester !! No Brexit for them ! Vote for them !/de/teams/724/ #canyoumakeit1

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Pepy, @SNCF CEO, warns that train strikes start as soon as Monday, an holiday in France. Trade unions not only trying to block moderate reforms launched by Macron. They will slow down the rebound of French economy and don't hesitate to take all citizens/users as hostages.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: French public deficit at 2.6% GDP for 2017. Great but don't explain there is no need for rigorous savings ! Net incoming cash-flows voted for the French State alone for 2018 are 242.9 bn and net spends have been authorized for... 329.6 bn, i.e. 35% more uses than sources !!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Extraordinary journey for a Paris bakery. French entrepreneurs are active in many different sectors, not necessarily tech ! @MaisonKayserUSA//t.co/uBslxvhpC3

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: While the new team is presenting Wendel 2017 results, I want to express my confidence in the company. 2017 was my last year with Wendel and our best collective performance ever ! Proud of our team ! @WendelGroup @_bgautier_ @jerome_michiels//t.co/UAp3Xaveg0

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: When an ex-director of the CIA writes THIS to the president of the United States, there is something deeply rotten in the kingdom of Washington !//t.co/8ToRV5PmTN

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: What would happen to us if God did not always give us the chance to start over again?

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: I am extremely proud of the very good results of @_BureauVeritas for 2017. We identified the need for more organic growth : this is done, and in a profitable way. Congratulations to the team who delivered what I asked them and what I was committed to for all shareholders !//t.co/J8FpzT5BzP

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: We don't think the world is getting better. This is why we're wrong//t.co/YjO6Ekt0Ch #history//t.co/bc7eSVDZhB

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Konrad Adenauer at Cologne : an humble leader for post-war Europe and the mayor of the city before the Nazis. No European progress without French-German friendship !//t.co/XMWXNAYIIF

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: -@rogerfederer is so inspiring for all leaders. So elegant. So determined. So successful. For him to be back in the number one seat impresses even more that for others to get a third or fourth gold medal in PyongCheang because his position reflects an average over last 12 months

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Congratulations to #Jean-Pierre Clamadieu for his appointment as chairman of @ENGIEgroup ! Hope this will help support a strong European champion for a sustainable economy. Again, I highly respect this role but have NEVER been a candidate for it.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Paris on a Saturday afternoon : (some) people just have a walk in bookshops ! I love this city !//t.co/FkvFIE9EDO

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: I was surprised to read in the French press that I was considered by @ENGIEgroup board of directors to be appointed Engie chairman. Thank you for this honor ! However I am NOT and I have NEVER been a candidate or a potential candidate for this role !!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: -#ChooseFrance deserves full support. By lowering taxes and attracting foreign investment, this is also a breach in the sacred equality between players and citizen. In a plane, not all passengers pay the same price ! @EmmanuelMacron invents the yield management of attractivity !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: I welcome #EmmanuelMacron s initiative to gather in Versailles CEOs of large multinational companies. A very clever way to leverage @Davos and to promote French reforms. France competes with always more countries: Germany or Italy but also Russia, Turkey, Mexico or Indonesia.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Quite impressed by my first visit to #stationF in Paris ! Nice infrastructure to host 200 start-ups. Mainly financed by a number of large companies, funds or schools that are present in the building to connect with entrepreneurs//t.co/GR2Jupunfh

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: My term @WendelGroup ended December 31st. It has been 9 fantastic years: share price went up from 15 to 145 euros and debt down from 6bn to 1 bn. Wendel became #1 private investor in Africa over 2013-16. I still represent Wendel at @saintgobain s board and I will tweet on!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: OECD #retirement age : 64.4 in average, but 60.2 for France. OECD retirement duration : 20.3 years in average, but 25.6 in France. Still some little reforms to launch in our country...

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Bureau Veritas, partner of Socit did Grand Paris in The Grand Paris Express, a full #BIM project. #BVInvestorDays #BVDigital//t.co/5Tq4UWydvb

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Bureau Veritas, partner of Socit did Grand Paris in The Grand Paris Express, a full #BIM project. #BVInvestorDays #BVDigital//t.co/5Tq4UWydvb

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Thank you to my team at @WendelGroup and to all Group companies ! Since the start of 2009, we together have created 8,5 billion euros of value. It was a great journey and I am sure that the success story will continue !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Since 2009: a strong reshuffling of portfolio #WENDELinvestors #InvestorDay//t.co/mO5WS6KUx8

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Since 2009: a strong reshuffling of portfolio #WENDELinvestors #InvestorDay//t.co/mO5WS6KUx8

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: ANR record 181,3 par action en hausse de + 30,0 % sur les 12 derniers mois #WENDELinvestors//t.co/yEmauSVXj3//t.co/AnvoPcAy7U

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: One of the 1200 French school orchestras performing tonight in Paris ! Vive Orchestre l'cole !//t.co/JGUZ58ikgZ

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Congratulations to Andr Franois-Poncet who will be my successor at the head of Wendel starting January 1st ! We will work together for a very smooth transition.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Trilateral commission meeting in London : great debate on "battle for truth". Wikipedia founder, Google EMEA head & very engaged EU official//t.co/193y9Js4S5

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Glad to see @saintgobain in fast growing mode ! Organic growth of 5.6% in Q3 ! Ideally positionned to support global sustainable development

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: This is the main reason why I decided in 2012 that Wendel should invest big way in Africa ! We're now #1 private investor out there !//t.co/K9aT2dHvNO

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: 2007 - 2017: Bureau Veritas IPO, 10 years certified.//t.co/A1fGmMb4gn

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: With the opening of PlaYce Palmeraie, shopping mall operated by SGI Africa, 320 direct jobs have been created in #Abidjan. #WENDELinvestors//t.co/QpMamzorQh

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Great for France and for French economy that Parliament voted the suppression of the wealth tax. At last ! The right wing failed in 2002-12!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Time goes by... and action can change reality, for the best or for the worse ! Venezuela was the world's fourth richest country in 1950 !//t.co/F6xw4Cx7SF

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Will leave Wendel on Dec 31st. Share price x 9 in 9 years ! Thanks to our teams & our companies' employees for having performed so well !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: What happens in an internet minute in 2017?//t.co/YW3DORwChU #technology//t.co/4BqNIzrv95

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Today @GettyMuseum in Los Angeles : absolutely amazing ! How one man success can serve universal culture and stimulate many generations !//t.co/wPZdpQZZ57

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: @GettyMuseum in Los Angeles : absolutely amazing ! How one man success can serve universal culture and stimulate many generations !//t.co/peSDjRCR4c

text: @GettyMuseum in Los Angeles : absolutely amazing ! How one man success can serve universal culture and stimulate many generations !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: @wef France's rank is low only because very high taxes (paid by parents & other) do fund most of the high public expenses for primary education.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Proud that our two listed companies @saintgobain and @_BureauVeritas have experienced a nice rebound in H1 with good prospect for 2017

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Wendel, a European company, can only be extremely saddened after #SimoneVeil 's passing away. A courageous survivor, a leading politician !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Visit at @PompidouMetz , outstanding exhibitions of contemporary art. 300k visitors/year. Fernand Lger + "An infinite garden": 2 must-see.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Wedding of former Serbian leader Bozidar Djelic in Belgrade. Now a partner with Lazard, Djelic made Serbia progress towards EU and the West

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: //t.co/NH2fjJE6Y8

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Now that @EmmanuelMacron has a clear majority, let's hope that his government will act quickly to boost efficiently growth, reforms & Europe

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: I chose Spain and #Barcelona to gather this week the whole @WendelGroup investment team. Spain's back. South Europe key to boost EU growth !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: - @WendelGroup & all our companies are mobilised against climate change. Trump's decision is nonsense! #trumpclimate #parisclimateagreement

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: - @WendelGroup & all our companies are mobilised against climate change. Trump's decision is nonsense! #trumpclimate #parisclimateagreement

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: -@saintgobain 's Investor Day today. Many drivers for value creation : construction is up, glass is everywhere +their HPM competing with 3M

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: - @_BureauVeritas AGM clearly shows how crucial their services will be in the 21st century! They bring trust & reliability everywhere!//t.co/HvHBgv21ng

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: At #WEFAfrica17, I have been impressed by Wolfgang Schables determination for putting Africa on top of the world's priorities at G20//t.co/00I39x1f2f

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: At #WEFAfrica2017 Pr Schwab welcomes Pdt Zuma & reminds us of Mandela's vision of leadership: serve your community more than serve yourself!//t.co/s5tUZ7a4HZ

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Very excited to co-chair this week in Durban the @wef regional meeting for Africa #WEFAfrica17 . @WendelGroup still committed to Africa !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Back from Vienna, I am impressed by the START programme to help young refugees study in Austria. Constantia Flexibles did a great job !//t.co/SF5ZJyna57

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: - @TheEconomist in total paradox : they choose Macron vs Fillon while they've consistently called for in depth structural reforms for France

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: On the eve of a beautiful Palm Sunday in France, my thoughts & prayers go to the victims and families attacked in Egypt. Awful barbarity!

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: My interview by Vonnie Quinn on Bloomberg TV//t.co/YCUL7LUl2R

name: Frédéric Lemoine

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Happy birthday to the @EuropeanUnion ! For 60 years, peace and prosperity thanks to Rome treaty. We need more and better Europe not less !

text: Trilatelal Commission annual meeting in Washington DC. A good opportunity to better understand Trump administration. Steve Mnuchin on stage!//t.co/wlMxNnAeKM

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Large majority of Dutch voters have rejected anti European populists. That's good news. We need you for a strong #Europe! #tk2017 @MinBZ

text: -#Brussels : such a lively & young city, welcoming today the large intl book fair. Culture everywhere despite political & language issues !//t.co/09ejHefEst

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: -@_BureauVeritas is helping the world to turn digital !//t.co/YMy3mxqVao

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Do not underestimate the value of example, for it is more powerful than a thousand words, a thousand likes, retweets or YouTube videos.

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Amazing immediate appointment of Nicolas Sarkozy at AccorHotels board. Observers will note that he avoids a vote by the AGM...in May 2017 !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: @IHSTowers is probably @WendelGroup 's most amazing investment : this video tells you how IHS will help Africa to win !//t.co/NtlE5UzLbi

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Kim Jong Un's brother assassinated in KL airport : this looks like a (sad) movie... North Korea should point at lack of safety in free world

text: Twitter* !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Every French spends 3h51/day watching TV, 1h42 on a PC and now 2h11 (from 0h52 in 2013) on a smartphone or a tablet. Let's stop Tweeter !

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: You can't impose self-confidence (see below)...French companies are certainly more self-confident than French citizens//t.co/ChdujM9GeK

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Proud to be @INSEAD board member ! MBA #1 ! Founded in 1959 in France, Insead has always been a global school, now in Singapore & Abu Dhabi.//t.co/uLbXqzCv4D

text: #FrancoisChereque died at 60. He has been the most courageous unionist in France over 50 years. We need more Chereques to reform France !

text: Christine @Lagarde is brave and helped a lot in financial crisis. Serving and dedicated, she did her best. Let her work at IMF for good !

text: French debate : two good candidates forced to answer journalists too strictly ! Thus no word on key issues : Europe, climate change or China

name: Frédéric Lemoine
text: Clinton gets two millions + more votes that Trump. "One man, one vote" does not apply ! Indirect democracy doesn't fit the world of internet

text: First primary election for center right in France : a great success with around 10% of population and clear choices. Few will regret Sarkozy

text: Clinton won US election : 60.5m votes vs 60.1m for Trump. Like Gore vs Bush in 2000. All states follow same trends. Why keep indirect vote ?
